name: daRUNma
description:
Extract the zip file then click on Sonk.exe to launch the game.

Controls : ZQSD to move, spacebar to drift, mouse to look around.

The game was made at ICAN (Paris) in the team's 2nd year of game design.

Team members :

Sébastien PAUTOT - Technical Game Design, Game Design, Programming, Documentation, VFX, Scenery, Sound Design.

Ulysse MICHEL - Project management, 3D Game Art, Game Design, Documentation.

Erwan LEVENE - Level Design, VFX, Game Design.

David COMPAS–COLLIN - Programming, Game Design.

Adam LECUYER - 3D Game Art, Game Design.
